summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, establishing a moratorium on the acceptance of applications for use permits or construction permits for seaplane operations or facilities in the "Downtown Harborfront 1" and "Downtown Harborfront 2" zones, establishing a permit termination date for permits issued for such uses for which applications were submitted before January 1, 1999, and declaring an emergency requiring a 3/4 vote of the Seattle City Council so that the Ordinance may take effect immediately.
